title: Real Humans – Echte Menschen (serie Arte)
notes: 2012-2014 Swedish sci-fi series, English: Real Humans, about humanoid robots - inspired UK remake Humans

title: Red Dust - Die Wahrheit führt in die Freiheit
notes: 2004 Tom Hooper South African drama with Hilary Swank about Truth and Reconciliation Commission - distinctive post-apartheid setting

title: Rider (The_USA ´2017)

title: Riesending (Ö/D/CH ´22_höhlendoku_Untersberg)
notes: 2022 documentary about 2014 cave rescue in Riesending cave system, Untersberg mountain - distinctive German caving incident

title: Rocker (D ´1971)

title: Roller Ball (GB/KAN/USA ´1975_/Trailer)

title: Samstag (An einem )
